item.title: Zoomies + Warm Swords
item.description: Next income täx refund show! Come Buß&Bet with us @Rxcvclvngmvsevm on Tuesday 19th Nov. We could still use some help at the entrance sluice, get in touch ❤️ fritz@u-bac.de Doors 20h00 Rock 20h30 Curfew 24h00 🔬🔬 Z o o m i e s 🔬🔬 (synth folk pop) started out as the solo prjct of Maxim [Parking Lot, Mellie, Autobahns, …]. Currently playing live as a 5☮️ feat. members of hell.no, Omni Selassi, Clara Fall, … Sonically ranging from folky finger picking to 80s synths pop, fluctuating frm introspective to playful with songs about 🐶 in 🪐 and grazing 🐳s.

item.title: Nina Harker + Blumes
item.description: ITR & T//F present: 21 Nov 2024 doors 19h00 startttt 19h30 @ R21 Nina Harker (collage music .FR) nina harker (Aguirre, 2023) Blumes (attic music .LPZ) BIG BIN MIND (Flennen, 2024) more info coming soon
